quotes.quote: At a certain point, you have to face the fact that you've turned into an old fart.
Verbal contracts are about as useful as a fart on a treadmill.
A happy fart never comes from a miserable ass.
Success is like a fart - only your own smells nice.
If I could light my own farts I could fly to the moon or at least Uranus.
Home is where the heart is, home is where the fart is. Come let us fart in the home. There is no art in a fart. Still a fart may not be artless. Let us fart and artless fart in the home.
What is like a smelly fart, that, although invisible is obvious? One's own faults, that are precisely as obvious as the effort made to hide them.
Pity, I've learned, is like a fart. You can tolerate your own, but you simply can't stand anyone else's.
Art is like a fart for the soul. Better out than in.

Farts come from no one and nowhere; they are anonymous emanations that belong to the group as a whole, and even when every person in the room can point to the culprit, the only sane course of action is denial.
Most people enjoy the sight of their own handwriting as they enjoy the smell of their own farts.
Any man can fart in a closed room and say that he commands the wind
Love is the fart of every heart: It pains a man when 'tis kept close, And others doth offend, when 'tis let loose.
A person who discreetly farts in an elevator is not a divine being, and a man needs to know this.
Complaining is mouth farting. And like any farting, I don't mind hearing my own, but I don't want to hear anyone else's.
I tell you, we are here on Earth to fart around, and don't let anybody tell you different.
Actions defined a man; words were a fart in the wind.
Having kids means there's always someone around to blame your fart on.
I'm a fart in a gale of wind, a humble violet, under a cow pat.
I always thought that farts were funny, and I always thought that they were mine to talk about because they came out of my body.
Don't be ashamed if you fart while urinating, there is no rain without thunder.
He that lives upon hope will die farting.
A celebrity farts, and everyone endures, but the unpopular will be thrashed to death.
